meanings.sent1: The clubbish decorations in the room made it feel exclusive.
meanings.sent2: She wore a clubbish outfit to the party, fitting right in.
meanings.sent3: The clubbish music playing in the background added to the fun atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The clubbish vibe of the event transported me to a different world.
meanings.sent5: The clubbish ambiance was so inviting that I didn't want to leave.

meanings.definition: inclined to form or join clubs
meanings.sent1: He is quite clubbish, always looking for new groups to join.
meanings.sent2: Being clubbish, she quickly became a member of the book club.
meanings.sent3: His clubbish nature led him to start his own knitting club.
meanings.sent4: She had a clubbish personality, making friends wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The clubbish tendencies of the students made the school vibrant with activities.

meanings.definition: relating to the atmosphere or behavior of a club
meanings.sent1: The clubbish chatter filled the room with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The clubbish behavior of the guests made the party lively.
meanings.sent3: Their clubbish antics kept everyone entertained throughout the night.
meanings.sent4: The clubbish energy in the air was contagious, making everyone dance.
meanings.sent5: The clubbish aura of the place made it a popular hangout spot.
